Julia Evans: I can spy on my CPU cycles with perf! strace(1) - Linux man page (lsof) Daniel Miessler: An lsof Primer tcpdump Open Scrum Robert Lord’s Blog Boulder Ruby Group Meetup

Open Source Keyboard Diodes Strange Loop Conference Inform Lea Albaugh: Inform Workshop at Strange Loop
32:32 - Julia’s Non-Programming Creative Hobbies
34:35 - Fixing/Testing Bugs

Regression Analysis P-Values Probability Null Hypothesis

Julia Evans: Asking questions is a superpower iOS Kernel
45:41 - Career Investments
So Good They Can't Ignore You: Why Skills Trump Passion in the Quest for Work You Love by Cal Newport GNOME Outreach Program for Women Gentoo Linux CSB
